layout_strategy.sidebar: Fixed left sidebar, dark theme (#0F172A) for high contrast
layout_strategy.tables: Clean lines, no vertical borders, generous row padding (py-4)

buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground shadow-sm

cards.style: bg-white rounded-xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.style: rounded-lg border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border-white/20 (Use sparingly for sticky headers)
visual_enhancers.empty_states: Use minimalist geometric shapes or clean typography

accessibility.contrast: Ensure WCAG AA compliance. Use text-slate-900 for main text, text-slate-500 for secondary.
accessibility.test_ids: All interactive elements must have data-testid

instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' for dynamic classes if not present.
Use 'recharts' for all charts. Keep them simple: 2D, minimal grid lines.
For the 'Mess' aspect, ensure the 'Individual Contributions' section in Revenue is easy to edit (inline editing).
Daily Report should be a 'Read Only' generated view with distinct visual separation from entry forms.
Use 'sonner' for toast notifications on success/error.
Implement a 'Bento Grid' for the Dashboard Home: Key Metrics (Top), Revenue Chart (Middle Left), Category Pie (Middle Right), Recent Activity (Bottom).
Ensure the Sidebar collapses on mobile to a hamburger menu.
Use 'Manrope' font for all headings to give it a distinct personality. Import via Google Fonts.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all financial data displayed in tables or summaries.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Do not use gradients for text.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
